sentences.en: Hang the two red lanterns on the top part of the lintel, please.
sentences.cn: 你把这两个红灯笼挂在门额上吧.

sentences.en: He went in , bowing his head under the low lintel.
sentences.cn: 门楣挺矮, 他低着头走进去.

sentences.en: Morgenes had to grasp the door lintel to keep from toppling.
sentences.cn: Morgenes不得不抓住门楣以防摔下去.

sentences.en: One of the advantages of the post and lintel frame is its resistance to earthquakes.
sentences.cn: 抬梁式结构的优点之一在于其抗震性.

sentences.en: Some of the monument's standing stones have lintel stones on top.
sentences.cn: 它矗立在英格兰索尔兹伯里市附近的平坦多风的索尔兹伯里平原上.

sentences.en: That Song Dynasty lintel etched with a frenzy of folk scenes?
sentences.cn: 蚀刻着狂热民俗场景的宋朝石雕梁?

sentences.en: Thus the post and lintel frame was eventually created.
sentences.cn: 于是最终形成了抬梁式结构.

sentences.en: Under the bed, on the lintel, in the barn - everywhere. But no sign of it.
sentences.cn: 我们的床下, 门机上、仓角里, 什么地方不找到?

trans.tran_en: a piece of stone or wood across the top of a window or door, forming part of the frame
